TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ManagedNameAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 可讓檢測類別，或檢測類別的成員，透過管理檢測設備呈現替代名稱。

span.span: Allows an instrumented class, or member of an instrumented class, to present an alternate name through management instrumentation.

summary.span: 注意：WMI .NET 程式庫目前被視為最終狀態，針對影響這些程式庫的非安全性相關問題，不會提供進一步的開發、增強功能或更新。

span.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

summary.span: [MI API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) 應使用於所有新的開發。

span.span: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

param.name: name
param.span: 套用於這個屬性 (Attribute) 的型別、欄位、屬性 (Property)、方法或參數的替代名稱。

span.span: The alternate name for the type, field, property, method, or parameter to which this attribute is applied.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體允許該類別使用替代的名稱指定套用於這個屬性 (Attribute) 的型別、欄位、屬性 (Property)、方法或參數。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that allows the alternate name to be specified for the type, field, property, method, or parameter to which this attribute is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 Managed 實體的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the managed entity.

value.span: 傳回 T:System.String 值，其中包含 Managed 實體的名稱。

span.span: Returns a T:System.String value containing the name of the managed entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value 包含受管理的實體名稱。Contains the name of the managed entity. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
